articles.title: Cognizant Q2 net profit up 12.7%, lowers full-year guidance
articles.description: The Teaneck, New Jersey-based firm lowered its full-year 2022 revenue growth guidance to 8.5-9.5% in constant currency at $19.7-19.9 billion, from the 9-11% growth it guided in the previous quarter.
